.. py:class:: nlls


   Nonlinear Lens Structure (plano-convex lens) parameters.

   .. py:property:: focal_length
      :type: float

      rc0 / (n0 - 1)

      :type: Optical focal length

   .. py:property:: rc
      :type: float

      Radius of curvature (m)

   .. py:property:: design_wavelength
      :type: float

      Design wavelength (m)

   .. py:property:: nz
      :type: int

      Number of steps

   .. py:property:: dz
      :type: float

      Step size in propagation direction

   .. py:property:: length
      :type: float

      Total lens length (m)

   .. py:property:: n0
      :type: float

      Index of refraction at center

   .. py:property:: k2
      :type: float

      Dispersion parameter

   .. py:property:: n2i
      :type: float

      Intensity-dependent nonlinear index

   .. py:property:: beta
      :type: float

      Two-photon absorption coefficient

   .. py:property:: alpha
      :type: float

      Linear absorption coefficient

   .. py:property:: material
      :type: str

      Material name

   .. py:property:: wavelength
      :type: float

      Operating wavelength (m)

   .. py:property:: medium_data
      :type: nlms

      Underlying medium data

   .. py:attribute:: version
      :type: int

      

   .. py:attribute:: medium
      :type: nlms

      

   .. py:attribute:: rc0
      :type: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]

      

   .. py:attribute:: wavelength_design
      :type: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]

      

   .. py:method:: __post_init__()

.. py:function:: SetK2_nlls(lens: nlls, k2: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: SetN2I_nlls(lens: nlls, n2: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: SetBeta_nlls(lens: nlls, beta: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: SetAlpha_nlls(lens: nlls, alpha: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: SetRC(lens: nlls, rc: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: SetMaterial_nlls(lens: nlls, mat: str) -> None

.. py:function:: SetWavelength_nlls(lens: nlls, lam: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: SetDesignWavelength(lens: nlls, lam: Annotated[float, numpy.float64]) -> None

.. py:function:: writelensparams(cmd: Union[str, pathlib.Path, TextIO], lens: nlls) -> None
